meanings.definition: The state of being subject to death.
meanings.sent1: The mortalities of all living things remind us of the circle of life.
meanings.sent2: The hospital keeps track of the mortalities to improve patient care.
meanings.sent3: Even superheroes cannot escape the mortalities of time.
meanings.sent4: The mortalities of our dreams can sometimes lead to new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the fragility of life through the mortalities in their painting.

meanings.definition: The number of deaths in a given population or period.
meanings.sent1: The mortalities in the war deeply affected the country's population.
meanings.sent2: The government analyzes the mortalities to understand public health trends.
meanings.sent3: The mortalities in the movie were so exaggerated, it became comical.
meanings.sent4: The mortalities in the statistics painted a grim picture of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The journalist reported on the mortalities with a sense of urgency.
